recipes.name: Grilled Kielbasa
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
Rinse and pat dry the chicken.
Rub the chicken with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Place half a lemon and three garlic cloves inside the chicken cavity.
Place chicken in a roasting pan.
Slice the remaining lemon and arrange around the chicken with the remaining garlic cloves and rosemary sprigs.
Roast for 1 hour and 30 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 165째F (74째C).
Allow chicken to rest for 10 minutes before carving.
Serve with pan juices.

recipes.name: Zuppa Toscana
instructions: Wash and dry lettuce, tear into bite-sized pieces.
In a large salad bowl, toss lettuce with caesar dressing.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese, toss to combine.
Top with anchovy fillets if desired.
Serve immediately.
